title: SMIC CEO Zhao Haijun says the industry is "a bit panicked" about memory shortages, and new supply may arrive in nine months; memory prices are up 80%+ in 2026 (Sherry Qin/Wall Street Journal)
tags: Wall Street Journal;SMIC CEO Zhao Haijun says the industry is“a bit panicked” about memory shortages, and new supply may arrive in nine months; memory prices are up 80%+ in 2026
